price: 112. Waxaan (markaa kaddib) ugu bishaareynay Isxaaq11_Nabi ka mid ah kuwa wanaagsan.
footnotes: 11. Tani waxay caddeyneysaa in wiilkiisa curadka ee la doonayey in la gowraco uu ahaa Ismaaciil oo ma uusan ahayn Isxaaq, sida ay sheegaan Yuhuudda iyo Nasaarada.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

translations: And We gave him glad tidings
